T02D1352:289b-1: se kod de sha ti phya ni /

T02D1352:290a-27: 'phang thob pa'o // ba'i phyir ram / bdud bzhi bcom pa'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das so //

T02D1352:290b-13: mdor bstan pa la sogs pa drug po de rnams

T02D1352:290b-16: ni mdor bstan pa la sogs pa'i mtha' drug gis

T02D1352:290b-25: mdor bstan nyid ni rgyas bshad pa'i //

T02D1352:290b-36: ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yang dag par brjod pa

T02D1352:290b-38: rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa yang dag par brjod pa ni /

T02D1352:291b-29: bskur ba dang sgrub pa'i thabs dang ye shes kyi

T02D1352:292a-1: pa lnga'i rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa'i rgyal ba'i

T02D1352:292a-15: gzhom du med pa'i sgra rnam dag pa zhes pa'i don to //

T02D1352:292a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis bum pa

T02D1352:292a-33: la sogs pa rnams kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa

T02D1352:292a-35: mngon par dbang bskur rgyas par bshad pa yin no

T02D1352:292a-43: sems dpa'i'o // shes rab gzugs brnyan ni /

T02D1352:292b-9: rnam par mi rtog cing rmi lam gyi snang ba ltar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1352:292b-10: da ni mig dag ma phye zhes bya ba la
T02D1352:292b-11: sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas sna tshogs gzugs brnyan
T02D1352:292b-12: bsgom pa'i rim pa gsungs te /

T02D1352:292b-14: dngos med ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su
T02D1352:292b-15: bcad pas rnam par rtog par sems la yang dang

T02D1352:292b-22: dngos po dngos med sems kyis min //
T02D1352:292b-23: gzugs brnyan ma brtags mthong phyir ro //
T02D1352:292b-25: ci ltar na der rnal 'byor pas sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1352:292b-27: pra phab ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1352:292b-28: me long ral gri mthe bong sgrol ma zla ba nyi //
T02D1352:292b-29: chu dang mig ste pra 'bebs 'jug pa brgyad du bshad //
T02D1352:292b-30: de la 'dir me long gsungs te /
T02D1352:292b-31: pra 'bebs pa na sgrub pa pos bsam pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1352:292b-33: ji ltar me long la gzhon nu mas 'das pa
T02D1352:292b-34: dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi rkun po
T02D1352:292b-35: la sogs pa'i rdzas rnam par ma brtags par snang
T02D1352:292b-36: ba de kho na bzhin du rnal 'byor bas kyang
T02D1352:292b-37: rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi rdul dang bral
T02D1352:292b-38: ba'i nam mkha' dri ma med pa la rnam par
T02D1352:292b-39: mi rtog sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan mthong ngo //
T02D1352:292b-41: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D1352:293a-1: nyid la don dam pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa dgag pa'i phyir /
T02D1352:293a-2: 'di las zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dpe gsungs te /
T02D1352:293a-3: 'di las ni phra phab pa las so //
T02D1352:293a-4: dngos po snang bzhin ba nyid na sgyu ma bzhin
T02D1352:293a-5: du rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir dngos po
T02D1352:293a-7: ci ltar na bcom ldan 'das de rnam par mi
T02D1352:293a-8: rtog pa'i ye shes kyis gzhan gyi don mdzad par
T02D1352:293a-9: 'gyur zhes bya ba'i dogs pa dgag pa'i phyir /
T02D1352:293a-10: med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis dpe gsungs te /
T02D1352:293a-11: ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rtog pas kyang
T02D1352:293a-12: stong la sems can gyi don yang byed pa de
T02D1352:293a-13: bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang rnam par rtog pa
T02D1352:293a-14: thams cad dang yang bral la /
T02D1352:293a-15: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa mtha'
T02D1352:293a-16: yas pa'i yon tan brnyes pa sems can thams cad
T02D1352:293a-17: kyi don yang mdzad de mi 'gal lo //
T02D1352:293a-18: da ni phra phab la zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1352:293a-19: pas ye shes kyi mi slu ba nyid gsungs te
T02D1352:293a-20: / 'dir ji ltar gzhon nu mas me long du
T02D1352:293a-21: rnam par ma brtags par rkun po la sogs pa
T02D1352:293a-23: de kho na bzhin du nyi tshe ba'i sems can
T02D1352:293a-24: rnams kyis kyang rkun po la sogs pa de rnams
T02D1352:293a-25: gzhon nu mas smras pa'i gnas rnams su song nas
T02D1352:293a-27: de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas
T02D1352:293a-28: kyang rnam par ma brtags par khams gsum pa mthong
T02D1352:293a-29: ste sems can rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur ro
T02D1352:293a-30: // ci yang yul gyi rnam pas dngos po gang
T02D1352:293a-31: snang bar 'gyur ba de ci yod pa'am med pa
T02D1352:293a-32: las 'gyur zhes bya ba'i mngon par zhen pa bsal
T02D1352:293a-33: // ba'i phyir / gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1352:293a-34: gal te re zhig dngos po yod pa mthong bar 'gyur ba yin na /
T02D1352:293a-35: de'i tshe me long la nye ba'i gzhon nu ma'i gdong pa yod bzhin pa nyid yin na /
T02D1352:293a-36: ci ltar na mthong bar mi 'gyur ba yin /
T02D1352:293a-37: med pas kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02D1352:293a-38: shin tu med pa'i mtshan nyid ri bong gi rva
T02D1352:293a-39: la sogs pa snang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1352:293a-40: ro // yod pa dang med pa la sogs par
T02D1352:293a-41: mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral
T02D1352:293a-42: ba sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dngos po mthong zhing
T02D1352:293a-43: don gyi bya ba yang byed par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1352:293b-1: da ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang pos mthong bar mngon par zhen pa dgag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1352:293b-2: gzhan gyi mig gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1352:293b-3: gzhan gyi mig dang dpral ba la sogs par yod pa dag gis mthong ba yin la /
T02D1352:293b-4: rang gi mig gis kyang mthong ba ma yin te /
T02D1352:293b-5: mig ras kyis bkab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1352:293b-7: rmi lam gyi mig gis mthong ba bzhin du mngon par zhen pa'i rtog pa dang bral ba dang /
T02D1352:293b-8: dngos po mthong ba mi 'gal lo //
T02D1352:293b-9: mthong ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di nyid kyi dpe gsungs te /
T02D1352:293b-10: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02D1352:293b-11: srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1352:293b-12: rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1352:293b-15: 'di nyid kyi ni sgrub byed bya //
T02D1352:293b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1352:293b-17: gzhon nu ma yi bu ji bzhin ;
T02D1352:293b-18: / zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam par ma brtags pa'i
T02D1352:293b-19: rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs brnyan mthong pa'i phyir
T02D1352:293b-20: / don gyis go bas so sor sdud pa dang
T02D1352:293b-21: bsam gtan du bshad pa'i yan lag gnyis gsungs pa
T02D1352:293b-22: / yin no // da ni srog rtsol dang 'dzin
T02D1352:293b-23: par bshad pa'i yan lag gnyis brjod par bya ste
T02D1352:293b-24: / yin no // / gzugs brnyan mthong nas te //
T02D1352:293b-25: rnam par ma brtags pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mthong ba yod na'o //
T02D1352:293b-27: zla ba dang nyi ma'i lam du srog gi rlung
T02D1352:293b-28: 'jug pa bsgyel nas dbu ma sgra gcan la rab
T02D1352:293b-29: tu 'jug pa'o // gang gi tshe aa wa dh'u
T02D1352:293b-30: t'i kho na'i srog lte ba la sogs pa'i 'khor
T02D1352:293b-31: lo rnams su rim gyis 'gog pa ni de bzhin
T02D1352:293b-34: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dang aa wa
T02D1352:293b-35: dh'u t'i dang bshad pa dang gci ba dang khu
T02D1352:293b-37: 'gog pa'i phyir ni sgrib pa med par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1352:293b-38: la la n'a la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams kho na'i
T02D1352:293b-39: rang bzhin gyi khyad par zla ba zhes pa la
T02D1352:293b-40: sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis grangs ji
T02D1352:293b-41: lta bar khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1352:293b-43: 'du shes la sogs pa'i phung po rnams kyi ste /
T02D1352:294a-2: mun can ni dbu ma sgra gcan gyi rtsa'o //
T02D1352:294a-4: zla ba thabs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1352:294a-5: tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis shes rab dang thabs
T02D1352:294a-6: dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs kyi
T02D1352:294a-7: dbye bas de rnams nyid rigs drug tu rtogs par
T02D1352:294a-8: bya'o // de la thabs kyi zhes pa ni /
T02D1352:294a-10: shes rab kyi zhes pa ni /
T02D1352:294a-13: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'chi ltas kyi mdor bstan pa'i tshig go //
T02D1352:294a-14: nyi ma ni srog gi nus pa'o //
T02D1352:294a-15: dus sbyor 'char ba'i mngon mtshams su //
T02D1352:294a-17: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag gi dbus su mnyam pa ste /
T02D1352:294a-18: rkang pa dang bcas pa lnga bcu rtsa drug gi
T02D1352:294a-19: dbugs aa w'a dh'u t'i gcig pu rab tu 'bab
T02D1352:294a-20: pa'o // 'di rnams nyin dang mtshan mor bcu gnyis
T02D1352:294a-21: kyis rkang pas dman pa'i bdun brgya'i dbugs su 'gyur
T02D1352:294a-23: rkang pas dman pa'i bdun brgya'i dbugs kyis so //
T02D1352:294a-24: phyogs gsum dang bcas zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1352:294a-25: lo brgya'i nyin zhag gi phung pos /
T02D1352:294a-26: rkang pas dman pa'i bdun brgya'i dbugs kyi phung po
T02D1352:294a-27: bsgyur ba la drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi
T02D1352:294a-28: shu rtsa gcig gi dbugs kyi chas thob pa ni
T02D1352:294a-29: nyin zhag so so'i tshad do //
T02D1352:294a-30: phung po de las kyang drug cu lhag pa'i sum
T02D1352:294a-31: brgya'i chas thob pa gsungs pa'i lhag ma'i nyin zhag
T02D1352:294a-32: dang bcas pa ni phyogs gsum dang bcas pa'i lo
T02D1352:294a-33: gsum ste dbu ma las byung ba'o //
T02D1352:294a-34: 'dir rnams dang bral ba'i lo brgya ni la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag las byung ba'o //
T02D1352:294a-35: steng du g-yon g-yas zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1352:294a-36: lte ba las steng du g-yon pa gang yin pa ni zla ba ste /
T02D1352:294a-37: la la n'a dang ai t'i ming can no //
T02D1352:294a-38: g-yas pa gang yin pa ni nyi ma ste /
T02D1352:294a-40: gzhan zhes pa ni ra sa n'a'i ming yang ngo //
T02D1352:294a-41: da ni tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gsum gyis
T02D1352:294a-42: chu la sogs pa'i khams yongs su dag pa ni
T02D1352:294a-43: la la n'a la sogs pa rtsa rnams kyi de
T02D1352:294a-44: bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag par brjod par bya ste
T02D1352:294a-45: / de la padma 'dzin la sogs pa ni 'od dpag med la sogs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1352:294a-46: dbus kyi rtsa zhes pa ni /
T02D1352:294b-0: g-yon ni rdo rje'i rtsa bar g-yon du gnas pa'i gci ba @294b 'bab ma'o //
T02D1352:294b-1: g-yas ni de nyid du g-yas su gnas pa'i khu ba 'bab ma'o //
T02D1352:294b-2: rdo rje 'dzin sgra gnyis pas ni /
T02D1352:294b-3: drug pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1352:294b-4: lte ba'i steng du gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi
T02D1352:294b-5: ma dang sgra gcan gyi rtsa rnams kho na bshad
T02D1352:294b-6: pa la sogs pa 'bab pa'i bya ba dang sbyor
T02D1352:294b-7: ba'i phyir na / bshad ba la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1352:294b-8: zla ba'i lam gyis bshad pa'i rtsa //
T02D1352:294b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa las blta bar bya'o //
T02D1352:294b-10: lte ba'i steng du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas ni /
T02D1352:294b-11: khu ba 'bab ma'i mthar thug par aa wa dh'u t'i'i ming gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1352:294b-12: lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni /
T02D1352:294b-13: aa wa dh'u t'i las khams lnga'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1352:294b-14: 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dag bsdu ba dang spro
T02D1352:294b-15: ba'i rang bzhin nyid du gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1352:294b-16: de kho na bzhin du lte gsang zhes bya ba
T02D1352:294b-17: la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni
T02D1352:294b-18: // lus dang ngag dang sems kyi chos kyi dung
T02D1352:294b-19: can ma las 'bab pa'i rim pa gsungs pa yin
T02D1352:294b-20: // no // 'di rnams ni khu ba 'bab ma'o //
T02D1352:294b-21: shes rab thabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas ni /
T02D1352:294b-22: la la n'a la sogs pa rigs drug gi rtsa
T02D1352:294b-23: rnams kyi gzhan gyi rigs la 'khyud pa las shes
T02D1352:294b-24: rab dang thabs su gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1352:294b-25: rdul 'bab phyir de gtum mo ste //
T02D1352:294b-26: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1352:294b-27: bud med rnams kyi dung can ma dang aa wa
T02D1352:294b-28: dh'u t'i dag ni rdul 'bab pa'i bde ba las
T02D1352:294b-29: re zhig gtum mo dang g-yung mo'i ming du 'gyur
T02D1352:294b-30: ro // skyes bu la yang rdul dang yang dag
T02D1352:294b-31: par sbyor ba kho na las lus skye ba'i phyir
T02D1352:294b-32: ro // na / nye bar brtags pa las ming gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T02D1352:294b-33: g-yon du rtag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas ni /
T02D1352:294b-34: g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna'i bu dag tu rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i phung po dang /
T02D1352:294b-35: sa la sogs pa'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu dbye ba dang /
T02D1352:294b-36: 'di dag gi dbus su aa wa dh'u t'i las
T02D1352:294b-37: drug pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang mtshon par
T02D1352:294b-38: bya'o // lte ba'i padma'i 'dab ma la /
T02D1352:294b-39: dkyil 'khor drug cu zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D1352:294b-40: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dkyil 'khor drug cu'i dbyu gu ste /
T02D1352:295a-0: dkyil 'khor lnga lnga rnams kyis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dbye bas lug la @295a * //
T02D1352:295a-1: sogs pa dang glang la sogs pa'i dus sbyor so
T02D1352:295a-2: so'i srog 'pho ba las lte ba dang sna'i bu
T02D1352:295a-3: ga dag tu mnyam pa dang 'pho ba bcu gnyis
T02D1352:295a-5: rtsa ba zhes pa la sogs pas ni sogs la
T02D1352:295a-6: sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'bab pa'i gnas gsungs te
T02D1352:295a-7: / de la rtsa ba ni sna bug gnyis ka'i 'og gi cha'o //
T02D1352:295a-8: g-yon ni gnyis ka'i dbus kyi sna rgyud kyi phyogs so //
T02D1352:295a-9: de bzhin du phyi dang ste dang dbus kyi cha
T02D1352:295a-10: rnams ni g-yas la sogs pa yin par shes par
T02D1352:295a-11: bya'o // lus las zhes pa ni lte ba'i gnas las so //
T02D1352:295a-12: 'dab ma'i dbus zhes pa la sogs pas //
T02D1352:295a-13: sna bug g-yon par rnam par shes pa la sogs
T02D1352:295a-14: pa'i rang bzhin gyis dang por shes pa'i srog 'bab
T02D1352:295a-15: pa'i rim pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1352:295a-16: shar ni steng dang gzhan ni 'og gi cha'o //
T02D1352:295a-17: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1352:295a-18: rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i phung po rnams
T02D1352:295a-19: ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams rnams las 'byung
T02D1352:295a-21: nye bar brtags nas tha dad pa med par rab tu bstan pa yin no //
T02D1352:295a-22: sa la sogs pa 'di rnams nyid sna'i bug dag
T02D1352:295a-23: tu sngar gsungs pa ni g-yas pas la sogs pa'o
T02D1352:295a-24: // gzhan ni sna g-yas pa'i bug pa'i 'og gi cha'o //
T02D1352:295a-25: 'dir sa la sogs pa dang por shar ba'i srog
T02D1352:295a-26: 'bab pa ni 'di nyid du shar la sogs pa
T02D1352:295a-27: ste / nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur zhir
T02D1352:295a-28: ri dang mnyan par bgrod pa zhes pa'i gsungs las
T02D1352:295a-29: ste / so // sna bug g-yon par nam mkha' la srog gi rlung 'char ba'i phyir //
T02D1352:295a-30: ci ltar nam mkha' shar ba nyi ma yin zhe na /
T02D1352:295a-32: de bzhi po'i dbus su byas nas shar la sogs pa'i tha snyad sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1352:295a-34: de la sna'i bug par ni steng la shar du brjod do //
T02D1352:295a-35: 'byung ba zhes pa ni spro ba'o //
T02D1352:295a-36: da ni gzhan zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su
T02D1352:295a-37: bcad pa bzhis sa dang rlung dag dang me dang
T02D1352:295a-38: chu dag dang nam mkha' dang ye shes kyi khams
T02D1352:295a-39: dag dang / mthe bong dang ming med la sogs
T02D1352:295a-40: pas tshim par byed pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i
T02D1352:295a-41: shes par byed pa phan tshun thabs dang shes rab
T02D1352:295a-43: de la mthe bong dang mdzub mo dang gung mo dang ming med dang mthe'u chung rnams ni /
T02D1352:295b-0: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yongs @295b su dag pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1352:295b-1: phyag rgya bcing ba las shes rab dang thabs rnam pa dag par shes par bya'o //
T02D1352:295b-2: mi 'gyur zhes pa ni ye shes kyi khams so //
T02D1352:295b-3: dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor //
T02D1352:295b-5: phung po dang khams dag gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1352:295b-6: rtse gcig ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D1352:295b-8: shes rab dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma ste /
T02D1352:295b-9: phung po dang khams dang rdo rje gsum po gcig
T02D1352:295b-10: tu 'dres par gyur pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par
T02D1352:295b-11: byed pa'o // da ni srog rtsol dang 'dzin pa
T02D1352:295b-12: dag gi mtshan nyid brjod pa'i sgo nas nye bar
T02D1352:295b-13: bsdu ba'i don du zla ba zhes pa la sogs
T02D1352:295b-14: pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis srog rtsol rgyas
T02D1352:295b-15: byed pa'o // par bstan la / sgra gcan zhes
T02D1352:295b-16: pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis
T02D1352:295b-17: ni 'dzin pa bshad pa yin no //
T02D1352:295b-18: 'di rnams grol na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1352:295b-19: tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ldog pa'i skyon gsungs
T02D1352:295b-20: pa yin no // da ni sngar mdor bstan pa'i
T02D1352:295b-21: 'chi ltas g-yon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1352:295b-22: tshigs su bcad pas gnyis ka rgyas par bshad pa
T02D1352:295b-23: pa yin no // nyid do // lnga zhes bya
T02D1352:295b-24: ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis
T02D1352:295b-25: nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi mtshan nyid gsungs so //
T02D1352:295b-27: sems can rnams kyi khams mi mnyam pa nyid las /
T02D1352:295b-28: g-yas kyi sna'i bug par mnyam par dus sbyor gyi
T02D1352:295b-29: gnas la gang gi tshe nyin mtshan lngar rnam par
T02D1352:295b-30: bar ma chad dang rlung 'bab pa de'i tshe 'chi
T02D1352:295b-31: ltas skye ba yin te lo gsum du 'tsho ba
T02D1352:295b-33: de nas nyin zhag sum cu lhag pa'i nyin zhag
T02D1352:295b-34: brgya phrag gsum du lte ba'i gnas kyi khyim bcu
T02D1352:295b-35: gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi 'dab ma bcu gnyis rnams
T02D1352:295b-36: su dkyil 'khor bcu yang dag par rgyu ba la
T02D1352:295b-37: sogs pa ji ltar rigs par 'bab pas /
T02D1352:295b-38: lo gsum las dman par byas nas phyi nas nyin
T02D1352:295b-39: zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i lo gnyis bzung
T02D1352:295b-40: ste / 'dab ma gnyis pa la rlung yang dag par rgyu'o //
T02D1352:295b-41: de nas 'dab ma de nyid la g-yas kyi sna'i
T02D1352:295b-42: bug par nyin mtshan bcur rnam par ma chad par
T02D1352:295b-43: 'bab ste / de nas nyin zhag sum cu rtsa
T02D1352:295b-44: lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag gsum du ji ltar rigs
T02D1352:295b-45: par 'dab pas dman par byas nas nyin zhag bcu
T02D1352:296a-1: bas lhag pa'i lo gcig bzung ste /

T02D1352:299a-14: mo'i rgyu las skyes pa'i 'bras bu ni /

T02D1352:299a-16: 'di kho na yin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu nyid ni /
T02D1352:299a-17: rnam par mi rtog pa bde ba chen po'i ye shes su 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1352:299a-18: las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya
T02D1352:299a-19: dag gi 'dod chags chen po la brten nas bsgom
T02D1352:299a-20: pa'i thabs la mkhas pa tsam bstan pa yin gyi
T02D1352:299a-21: de dag rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1352:299a-22: skye bar byed pa po nyid ni ma yin no
T02D1352:299a-23: // mi 'gyur ba de zhes pa ni /
T02D1352:299a-24: sku bzhi po gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa rnam
T02D1352:299a-25: par mi rtog pa bde ba chen po'i ye shes
T02D1352:299a-26: so // de la ci 'di 'phel ba'i rang bzhin 'phel bar 'gyur ram /
T02D1352:299a-28: gnyis ka ltar yang mi rigs te /
T02D1352:299a-30: 'phel ba'i rang bzhin gyi 'phel ba ni don med pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1352:299a-31: mi 'phel ba'i rang bzhin gyi nus pa dang mi 'byor pa'i phyir ro zhes rgol na /
T02D1352:299a-32: don dam pa'i bden pa la brten nas rtsod par
T02D1352:299a-33: bya ba ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya ba'i
T02D1352:299a-34: phyir du / 'phel ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1352:299a-35: pa tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs pa yin no
T02D1352:299a-36: phyir du / // gal te de ltar na skye ba dang 'gag par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1352:299b-0: rang bzhin @299b zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1352:299b-1: rang bzhin med pa'i chos gang yin pa de rnams
T02D1352:299b-2: kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa dag ni sgyu ma
T02D1352:299b-3: bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes pa sgyu ma'i dpe
T02D1352:299b-4: las kun rdzob kyi bden par thams cad mi 'gal
T02D1352:299b-5: lo // ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa dang
T02D1352:299b-6: dngos po dang dngos po med pa sna tshogs la
T02D1352:299b-7: mtha' gcig tu phyogs su mngon par zhen pa du
T02D1352:299b-9: 'byung rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1352:299b-10: dngos dang dngos med mtshan nyid gcig / ces pa ni /
T02D1352:299b-11: dngos po'i rnam pa thams cad dang dngos po med pa ni /
T02D1352:299b-12: stong pa nyid dang 'od gsal ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1352:299b-13: de'i phyir na gcig pa ste tha mi dad pa'i
T02D1352:299b-14: mtshan nyid de rang bzhin gang gi yin pa de
T02D1352:299b-16: de ltar yang 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis /
T02D1352:299b-17: dngos las stong nyid gzhan min te //
T02D1352:299b-18: de dor nas kyang dngos yod min //
T02D1352:299b-19: de phyir rkyen las skyes dngos rnams //
T02D1352:299b-20: stong par khyod kyis rab tu bstan //
T02D1352:299b-22: rang gi shes rab ces pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D1352:299b-23: las dang ye shes dang phyag rgya chen mo la ltos nas gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1352:299b-24: de la las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi
T02D1352:299b-25: phyag rgya brtags shing bsgoms pa las skyes pa'i byang
T02D1352:299b-26: chub kyi sems kyi thig le dang zhing zhu ba
T02D1352:299b-27: rdo rje'i rtse mor son pa gang yin pa de
T02D1352:299b-29: don dam pa'i bden pa bsgoms pa las 'dzag pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1352:299b-30: lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis ni /
T02D1352:299b-31: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rang gi rten gyi
T02D1352:299b-32: rtsa rnams su sku la sogs pa so sor bsgom
T02D1352:299b-33: pa'i yongs su dag pa bstan te /
T02D1352:299b-34: gang gi tshe slar yang dung can mar lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bsgom pa de'i tshe /
T02D1352:299b-35: 'di nyid du sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams
T02D1352:299b-36: lhan cig skyes pa dang gcig tu 'dreg par gyur
T02D1352:299b-38: mgo bo ni dpral ba las te /
T02D1352:299b-39: rdzogs pa'i gnas su ni gsangs ba'i padmar ro //
T02D1352:299b-40: bcing ba ni brtan pa'i dngos po ste /
T02D1352:299b-42: phyag rgya chen mo'i de kho na nyid bsgoms pa las so //
T02D1352:299b-43: rdzogs pa gang zhes pa ni /
T02D1352:300a-1: cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1352:300a-2: de la skad cig thams cad rdzogs //
T02D1352:300a-3: zhes pa ni skad cig ma phyi ma rnams dang /
T02D1352:300a-4: rnam par ma brtags pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i skad
T02D1352:300a-5: cig ma thog ma rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyi
T02D1352:300a-6: phyir te / de skad du yang /
T02D1352:300a-7: gang gis de nyid las ni dngos gcig mthong //
T02D1352:300a-8: de yis dngos kun de nyid las mthong ngo //
T02D1352:300a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1352:300a-11: 'dir dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1352:300a-12: de yang drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu
T02D1352:300a-13: rtsa gcig gi grangs ni skad cig thams cad du
T02D1352:300a-14: brjod do // de la dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad 'gog pa las /
T02D1352:300a-15: mtshan ma dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gcig
T02D1352:300a-16: tu 'dres par gyur pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyis sa
T02D1352:300a-17: gcig thob la / de bzhin du rim gyis sa
T02D1352:300a-18: bcu gnyis so sor thob pa las skad cig thams
T02D1352:300a-19: cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
T02D1352:300a-21: cha bcu drug pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi'o //
T02D1352:300a-22: cha nyams pa zhes pa ni /
T02D1352:300a-23: cha bco lnga kho na dor ba yin gyi cha bcu drug pa'i ni ma yin te /
T02D1352:300a-24: de ni 'chi ba'i dus kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no ;
T02D1352:300a-27: ye shes nyams pa min zhes pa ni /
T02D1352:300a-28: cha bcu drug pa yongs su drog ba min pa'o //
T02D1352:300a-30: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes kyi'o //
T02D1352:300a-31: dngos po bar ma gzhan zhes pa ni /
T02D1352:300a-36: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1352:300a-38: chags pa dang chags bral la sogs pa'o //
T02D1352:300a-39: ji ltar chu bo'i chu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpes /
T02D1352:300a-40: bde ba chen po'i ye shes la zhugs pa na
T02D1352:300a-41: dngos po thams cad lhan cig skyes pa dang ro
T02D1352:300a-42: mnyam pa nyid du gsungs te /
T02D1352:300a-43: dang por mngon du byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni
T02D1352:300a-44: rnam par mi rtog pa so so rang rig pa'i
T02D1352:300a-45: bsam gtan las langs pa na /
T02D1352:300b-0: bdag la bde ba 'di byung ngo zhes ji lta ba'i gtam @300b byed do //
T02D1352:300b-1: kun nas rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni /
T02D1352:300b-2: de lta bu ma yin te /
T02D1352:300b-3: de ni rnam par thams cad du bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1352:300b-4: 'di rnams nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1352:300b-5: mche rma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpe dang dpe can gsungs te /
T02D1352:300b-6: de la rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs ni gtsug tor gyi gnas su'o //
T02D1352:300b-7: sems ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i byang chub kyi sems su'o //
T02D1352:300b-8: rdzogs nas zhes pa ni 'dzag pa med pa la
T02D1352:300b-9: sogs pa'i dbye bas ji srid cha bcu drug pa
T02D1352:300b-10: yongs su rdzogs pa nyid thob pa na'o ;
T02D1352:300b-11: / ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su
T02D1352:300b-12: bcad pa gnyis kyis ro'i dpes rnam par mi rtog
T02D1352:300b-13: pa phyag rgya chen mo las skyes pa'i ye shes
T02D1352:300b-14: rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir las kyi phyag
T02D1352:300b-16: thabs la mkhas pa yin no zhes gsungs te /
T02D1352:300b-17: gang gi tshe kun rdzob kyi bden par yang /
T02D1352:300b-18: ro'i reg pa la sogs pas 'bugs pa'i nus pa
T02D1352:300b-19: 'jig rten pas gzung bar mi nus pa de'i tshe
T02D1352:300b-20: / don dam par mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi ye shes kyis ci zhig ces pa'o //
T02D1352:300b-22: ci 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
T02D1352:300b-23: / dri ma rang bzhin du lhag par gnas na /
T02D1352:300b-24: grub par gyur ba ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1352:300b-25: sems la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su
T02D1352:300b-26: bcad pas ni dam bca' ba bzhi nye bar bstan
T02D1352:300b-27: la / gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni /
T02D1352:300b-28: de nyid sgrub par byed do //
T02D1352:300b-29: ye shes stong pa nyid dang sbyor ba las /
T02D1352:300b-30: ci de rang bzhin chad pa'am rtag par 'gyur zhes dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
T02D1352:300b-31: ji ltar zangs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1352:300b-32: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis dpe dang dpe can
T02D1352:300b-33: gyi dbye bas ngo mtshar ba nyid gsungs so //
T02D1352:300b-35: dri ma de zangs kyi yin na /
T02D1352:300b-36: de las tha mi dad pa'am tha dad pa yin /
T02D1352:300b-37: gal te tha mi dad na /
T02D1352:300b-38: ro'i sbyor bas dri ma nyams pa na /
T02D1352:300b-40: de'i bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1352:301a-2: zangs kyi'o zhes ci ltar thob ste /
T02D1352:301a-3: de dang 'brel pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1352:301a-4: des na yang ji ltar tha dad pa dang /
T02D1352:301a-5: tha mi dad par brjod par bya ste /
T02D1352:301a-6: dri ma nyams pa las gser du snang ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02D1352:301a-7: de kho na bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi sbyor bas mi shes pa'i dri ma dor ba las /
T02D1352:301a-8: mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyi gnas /
T02D1352:301a-9: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu mi gnas pa /
T02D1352:301a-11: rnam par mi rtog pa rnam pa thams cad pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1352:301a-12: de ltar yang sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis /
T02D1352:301a-13: rtog pa nyams pa blo nyams pa'i //
T02D1352:301a-14: blo ngan rjes su rtog byed lo //
T02D1352:301a-15: blo bzang rnams la 'di nyid las //
T02D1352:301a-16: mkha' las lhag par ci yang 'char //
T02D1352:301a-18: 'gyur med bde ba zhes pa ni /
T02D1352:301a-19: rnam par mi rtog pa'i bde ba chen po la'o //
T02D1352:301a-21: 'khor bar chags pa'i bag chags kyis 'pho ba la mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02D1352:301a-23: rjes su gnas par mi bya ba ste /
T02D1352:301a-25: chags pa'i bag chags kyis 'pho ba ni /
T02D1352:301a-26: 'khor ba 'phel ba'i rtsa ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1352:301a-27: 'di ni 'phos pa las ni zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs so //
T02D1352:301a-28: bde ba don du gnyer ba'i 'jig rten pas kyang
T02D1352:301a-29: 'pho ba'i bde ba 'dod cing re bar bya ba
T02D1352:301a-30: ma yin na / de ci ltar na /
T02D1352:301a-31: de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas 'dod par
T02D1352:301a-32: bya ba yin zhes bya ba 'di ni chags can
T02D1352:301a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa yin no
T02D1352:301a-34: // de'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i byang chub
T02D1352:301a-35: kyi sems 'gyur ba med pa'i rnal 'byor kho na
T02D1352:301a-36: // las / ma brtags pa mchog tu mi 'gyur
T02D1352:301a-37: ba'i bde ba chen po bsgrub par bya ba yin
T02D1352:301a-38: // las / gyi / brtags pa'i h'um dang /
T02D1352:301a-39: phat la sogs pa'i yi ge 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor las ni ma yin te /
T02D1352:301a-40: 'di ni khu ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1352:301a-41: don dam pa'i bden pa las ni /
T02D1352:301b-0: sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i rtog pa yang yod pa ma @301b yin te /
T02D1352:301b-1: 'di ni sems zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1352:301b-2: 'di nyid ni rnam par mi rtog pa 'gyur ba
T02D1352:301b-3: med pa'i ye shes las skyes pa'i sku'i h'um yig
T02D1352:301b-4: la sogs pa brtag cing 'gyur ba'i sa bon las
T02D1352:301b-5: skyes pa ni de kho na nyid yin pa 'gog
T02D1352:301b-6: pa gsal bar byed pa bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D1352:301b-7: 'gyur med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1352:301b-8: da ni stong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D1352:301b-9: rnam par mi rtog pa gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D1352:301b-10: shes kyi kun rdzob kyi bden pas rgyu dang 'bras
T02D1352:301b-13: rang bzhin med pa las skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs so //
T02D1352:301b-15: rnam par mi rtog pa rnam pa thams cad pa phyag rgya chen mo'i ye shes las skyes pa'o //
T02D1352:301b-16: snying nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa kho na'i don te /
T02D1352:301b-17: ming gzhan gyis gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1352:301b-18: stong pa nyid kyi gzugs brnyan dang /
T02D1352:301b-19: mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes dag la chad pa dang rtag pa nyid du dogs pa ni /
T02D1352:301b-20: mya ngan las 'das pa bral ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas sel bar byed do //
T02D1352:301b-21: ci ltar na chad pa dang rtag pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i lan ni /
T02D1352:301b-22: dngos med ces bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02D1352:301b-24: dngos med las byung mtshan nyid phyir //
T02D1352:301b-26: rnal 'byor pa so so rang gis rig pa rang
T02D1352:301b-27: bzhin med pa las byung ba rnam pa thams cad
T02D1352:301b-28: pa snang bzhin pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1352:301b-29: // dngos po las byung mtshan nyid phyir //
T02D1352:301b-31: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa las byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1352:301b-33: dngos med ces bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1352:301b-34: gzugs dang gzugs min rnam des grol //
T02D1352:301b-36: rtag pa dang chad pa dang dngos po dang dngos
T02D1352:301b-37: po med pa la sogs par 'dzin pa dang bral
T02D1352:301b-39: shes rab ces pa la sogs pas sngar gsungs pa'i
T02D1352:301b-40: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ma brtags shing gnyis su
T02D1352:301b-41: med pa'i gzugs nyid du gsungs te /
T02D1352:302a-1: pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid do //
T02D1352:302a-4: yod pa dang med pa dang gnyis ka dang gnyis ka ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1352:302a-6: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid de //
T02D1352:302a-8: de ltar yang 'bum phrag lnga pa'i kye rdo rje las /
T02D1352:302a-9: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D1352:302a-10: stong nyid rgyu ni dang por te //
T02D1352:302a-11: phyi nas dmigs med snying rje yis //
T02D1352:302a-14: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis ma grub pa'i rgyu'i 'bras bu ni /
T02D1352:302a-15: rgyu las skyes par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1352:302a-16: 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D1352:302a-17: rgyu dang 'bras bu yod na rgyas gdab par bya ba dang rgyas 'debs pa por 'gyur na /
T02D1352:302a-18: gang gi tshe de dag nyid kyi rang bzhin ma
T02D1352:302a-19: grub pa de'i tshe ci ltar na der 'gyur zhes
T02D1352:302a-20: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1352:302a-22: rnam pa thams cad nyid du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po med pa yin nam zhe na /
T02D1352:302a-24: rgyu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1352:302a-26: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu
T02D1352:302a-27: dang 'bras bu'i dngos po sgyu ma la sogs pa'i
T02D1352:302a-28: bden par bsgrub pa kun rdzob kyi bden par yod
T02D1352:302a-29: pa kho na'o // de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs par rtog pa dang bral ba /
T02D1352:302a-30: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid zung du 'jug pa'i gzugs /
T02D1352:302a-31: bde ba chen po'i ye shes dus thams cad du shar bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1352:302a-33: phan tshun zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1352:302a-34: de ltar yang sa ra pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1352:302a-35: byed pa dang bral 'gro la rtag tu shar //
T02D1352:302a-36: gang zhig dus su nges par gsungs pa na //
T02D1352:302a-37: thams cad mkhyen pa'ang tshig gis dbul 'gyur ba //
T02D1352:302a-38: bde ba'i rgyal po gcig pu rgyal gyur cig / ces pa'o //
T02D1352:302a-39: gal te re zhig chos rnams ma skyes shing ma 'gags pa yin na /
T02D1352:302b-0: shes bya dang shes pa'i rnam pas tha snyad du grub @302b par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1352:302b-2: de ni rang sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1352:302b-3: rmi lam lta bu'i rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i shes bya mthong ba yang 'di lta bu'o //
T02D1352:302b-5: rnam par shes pa smra ba'i don dam par yod pa'i mtshan nyid do zhe na /
T02D1352:302b-6: de'i phyir bdag gis bdag nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D1352:302b-7: rnam par shes par yod pa yang 'gog par byed bzhin du gsungs so //
T02D1352:302b-8: mo gsham zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1352:302b-9: rnam par ma brtags pa rnam pa thams cad pa'i
T02D1352:302b-10: gzugs brnyan las skyes pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye
T02D1352:302b-11: shes kyi gzugs dpe dang bcas pa gsungs pa'o //
T02D1352:302b-13: ji ltar rmi lam du rang bzhin gyis ma skyes
T02D1352:302b-14: pa'i snang ba'i mo gsham gyi bu mo dang 'grogs
T02D1352:302b-15: pas / sems can ci yang rung bas bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1352:302b-16: de bzhin du de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1352:302b-17: rang bzhin gyis ma skyes shing rnam par mi rtog
T02D1352:302b-18: pa rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs brnyan dang gcig
T02D1352:302b-20: ma brtags pa'i bde ba chen po myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1352:302b-21: da ni shes rab ma yin zhes bya ba la
T02D1352:302b-22: sogs pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i bde ba chen
T02D1352:302b-23: po'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi khyad par de dang
T02D1352:302b-24: de gsungs so // da ni rang byung zhes ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis /
T02D1352:302b-26: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye
T02D1352:302b-27: shes 'di nyid kyi mthar thug pa thob pa'i sna
T02D1352:302b-28: tshogs pa'i ming mdor bstan pa'i tshig gsungs nas /
T02D1352:302b-29: rdo rje mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1352:302b-30: rnams kyis ni mdor bstan pa'i tshig 'di rgyas par
T02D1352:302b-33: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang sku yongs su dag pa /

T02D1352:302b-35: bu byad pa dang dri ma dang bral ba nyid
T02D1352:302b-37: lhan cig skyes pa dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs

T02D1352:303a-0: su dag pa / rdo rje sems dpa' dang byang chub @303a * //
T02D1352:303a-1: sems dpa' dang sems dpa' chen po rnams dam tshig sems dpa'i rang bzhin du gsungs so //

T02D1352:303a-3: tshogs pa rigs bzhir sdom pa'i dbye ba shes par
T02D1352:303a-4: bya'o // de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T02D1352:303a-5: ye shes dang me dang nam mkha' dang sa dang
T02D1352:303a-6: rlung dang chu'i khams yongs su dag pa /
T02D1352:303a-7: ye shes dang tshor ba dang rnam par shes pa

T02D1352:303a-15: 'dod pa chen po yongs su dag pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D1352:303a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa drug rnam par dag pa rigs drug tu gsungs so //
T02D1352:303a-22: rigs bzhi dang rigs drug 'di nyid kyi rnal 'byor
T02D1352:303a-23: dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad la khyab pa
T02D1352:303a-24: ste / rigs bzhi dang rigs drug gi dbye ba kho na bshad pa yin no //
T02D1352:303a-25: sku zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis ni dkyil 'khor gsum gsungs so //
T02D1352:303a-26: gsang ba'i dbang po ni gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1352:303a-28: zla ba bzang po la bod pa'o //
T02D1352:303a-29: dbang mdor bstan pa'i mdor bshad pa //
T02D1352:303a-30: bdag gis bris las dge ba gang //
T02D1352:303a-31: thob des rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D1352:303a-32: go 'phang skye bos thob par shog / s'a h'u
T02D1352:303a-33: pu tra dpal 'dzin dga' bas mdzad pa'i dbang mdor
T02D1352:303a-34: bstan pa'i mdor bshad rdzogs so /
